resources.string: Are you sure you want to go back to the main menu?
Are you sure you want to quit the app?
How do you want to call your current location?

Avoid touching your face, mouth, nose and eyes.

Use masks which cover your nose and mouth while staying in closed spaces.

Ventilate rooms you stay in.

Wash your hands with soap and water or use a 70\% alcohol based disinfectanat.
Send daily notifications with suggestions and tips
Input the name of the location!
Current location not found, try again
Zoom in on your current location.
Delete a location by holding the name of a location marker.\n\nYou can toggle location tracking and particular notifications in the settings.

Pandemic Buddy collects location data to enable location tracking so that the user can receive adequate notifications even when the app is closed or not in use.

This setting can be toggled off in by toggling the "Track the device's location" off.

The current location of the device is compared to locations the user has manually saved and the app sends you notifications depending on what location the device is closest to.

No data is being sent to the developers or any third party.
Pandemic Buddy collects location data to enable current location saving and zooming in.\n\nNo data is being sent to the developers or any third party.
